title: jagajjanani
sahitya:
jagajjananI sukhapANI kalyANI 

(jagajjananI)



anupallavi



sukha svarUpiNI madhuravANI shokkanAthar manam

magizhu-minAkSi 

(jagajjananI)



caraNam 



pANDyakumAri bhavAni ambA shiva pancamI paramEshvarI

vENDum varam tara innum manam illaiyO vEda vEdAnta nAda svarUpiNI

(JagajjananI)
